resources.string:
Quick Reminders:
\u2022Pin Notes & Reminders to your notification pull-down.

Designed & Developed By:
\u2022 Lee Bailey (AKA @LeeDrOiD)

Translations By:
\u2022 G Alarco/@guillerag - Spanish
\u2022 SÃ©rgio Neto - Portuguese
\u2022 Star Walking - Thai

Quick Tip\'s:
\u2022 Create a high priority reminder to show an icon in the status bar.
\u2022 Low priority notifications are fully collapsible.
\u2022 Sticky notifications cannot be accidentally swiped away.
\u2022 Schedule a notification to appear at a specific time.

Feel free to contact me directly & don\'t forget to leave a review 😀
Oops.. looks like something went wrong & Quick Reminders Crashed!\n\nSorry for the inconvenience.
Quick Reminders notifications are disabled. Click here to go to settings and re-enable them.
Reminder will be lost if you do not click save.
No application installed to handle speech recognition
A non sticky note when swiped away will remain in your active reminders list, the notification will not re-spawn unless the app or device is restarted.
